answers.answer: Hi!You should consult a doctor to rule out diabetes, hypothyroidism, anemia, electrolyte imbalance, low iron, low vitamin D and cervical nerve compression in the neck. Sleep disturbances and low or high blood pressure too can cause similar problems. Do discuss this with your doctor and get yourself examined. Take care!The medical advice given should not be considered a substitute for medical care provided by a doctor who can examine you. The advice may not be completely correct for you as the doctor cannot examine you and does not know your complete medical history. Hence this reply to your post should only be considered as a guiding line and you must consult your doctor at the earliest for your medical problem.
thank you , yeah i do have compression in neck and i also can't take breath in by mouth , is it possible that its happening because of compression in neck .

question: Hi I'm David and i am 22 years old actually i feel my head asleep from last 1 month and also feel like some have putted hands on my upper head and back head and i feel everything strange and awkward also seems like i'm going to fell , frequently i feel delay in my sight as well it seems like i'm drunk and when i am talking to someone it seems like i'm not talking but someone else is talking and feel my head and body Extrinsic, it happens for 10 days or more then that but it get a bit OK after that for only 5 to 6 days and after that it happens again , it happend before but that was only for 2 or 3 days . title: Feeling Head Asleep
